name: Community energy – case studies
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session showcases some exemplary community energy schemes, featuring a council-wide renewables masterplan for renewable energy to be provided locally; community energy generation for a 23-storey tower block; implementing a district energy scheme into existing urban communities; and a community energy scheme in a mixed-use development.

presentations.name: Case study: Cheshire east renewables masterplan
presentations.speakers: Rob Shaw, Director of Sustainability and Climate Change, LDA

presentations.name: Case Study: Grenfell Tower Estate
presentations.speakers: Bill Watts, Senior Partner, Max Fordham

presentations.name: How to implement district energy solutions in existing urban areas
presentations.speakers: Simon Woodward, Chief Executive, Cofely District Energy, and Chairman, UK District Energy Association

presentations.name: Mixed-use development: Graylingwell Park
presentations.speakers: Rebecca Taylor, Partner, John Thompson & Partners
